short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Volley lets you give fast, easy feedback for your website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply create a project, invite your team and use the chrome extension to start annotating your website. Your notes are sent to an easy-to-use collaborative workspace where your entire team can review and resolve the notes with ease.
